text: PRRSV infection (m.o.i = 0.5) significantly increased the levels of LDH produced during necrosis 12 and 24 hours p.i. (Fig 9) . Treatment with tulathromycin (1mg/mL) significantly reduced PRRSV cell necrosis at 12 hours (Fig 9) . This effect of tulathromycin could no longer be detected at 24 hours. Tulathromycin alone did not alter levels of necrosis (Fig 9) . Triton-X (Trit-X), used as a pro-necrotic positive control, induced necrosis in MDMs (Fig 9) .
